Packages 
Package Description
analysis
analysis package: a package implementing parallel algorithms for numerical differentiation and integration, and also including more complex transformations such as convolution.
graph
graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.
graph.coarsening
package defines abstract classes and implements algorithms for coarsening graphs.
graph.packing
Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.
graph.partitioning
Package defines interfaces and implements algorithms for graph and hyper-graph partitioning.
parallel
parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.
parallel.distributed
Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.
popt4jlib
popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
popt4jlib.BH
Generalized Adaptive Basin Hopping
popt4jlib.DE
Differential Evolution Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.EA
Evolutionary Algorithms Parallel Implementation
popt4jlib.GA
Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.GradientDescent
Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
popt4jlib.GradientDescent.stochastic
Stochastic Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for (deterministic or stochastic) real vector function optimization).
popt4jlib.LIP
package contains parallel implementations of some well-known algorithms for Linear Integer Programming, including Balas' Additive Algorithm (dating back to an Operations Research article of 1965).
popt4jlib.LocalSearch
Local Search algorithms parallel implementation for combinatorial optimization problems.
popt4jlib.MinExplainSet
Package implements algorithms for the so-called Minimum Explaining Set, an optimization problem arising in Data Mining applications.
popt4jlib.MonteCarlo
Monte-Carlo Search Parallel Implementation (aka random search)
popt4jlib.MSSC
Package implements algorithms for Minimum-Sum-of-Square(-Errors)-Clustering, a well-defined optimization problem.
popt4jlib.MSSC1D
Package implements a Parallel Dynamic-Programming (DP) - based algorithm for clustering in a Minimum-Sum-of-Square-Error-Distances a sequence of numbers.
popt4jlib.network
Network Flow Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.neural
Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.neural.costfunction
Cost Functions for Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.NumberPartitioning
Package defines parallel/distributed versions of well-known Number Partitioning algorithms.
popt4jlib.PS
Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.PS.FA
Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.
popt4jlib.SA
Simulated Annealing Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
tests
tests package: defines functions used for testing the optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib library.
tests.sic.rnqt.nbin
tests.sic.rnqt.nbin package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing stochastic demands that are distributed according to the Negative Binomial distribution (a compound Poisson distribution where customers arrive at intervals that are spaced according to the Poisson distribution, but their order quantities are logarithmically distributed instead of being always single unit demands) in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
tests.sic.rnqt.norm
tests.sic.rnqt.norm package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing normally distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
tests.sic.rnqt.poisson
tests.sic.rnqt.poisson package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (R,nQ,T) facing Poisson distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
tests.sic.sST.det
tests.sic.sST.det package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run exact average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (s,S,T) facing deterministic demands with constant demand rate, in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
tests.sic.sST.nbin
tests.sic.sST.nbin package: implements exact and heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run exact average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (s,S,T) facing sporadic demands modeled as a compound Poisson process, and in particular the Negative Binomial process with Poisson arrivals and Logarithmic distribution of the quantities asked, with parameters λ and pl in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
tests.sic.sST.norm
tests.sic.sST.norm package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (s,S,T) facing normally distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
tests.sic.sST.poisson
tests.sic.sST.poisson package: implements exact and/or heuristic algorithms for the global optimization of long-run expected average costs of a single-echelon inventory control system operating a periodic review control policy (s,S,T) facing Poisson distributed demands in a continuous time cost-accounting setting.
utils
utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.
